selected_quotes: Our paper showing pyramidal neuron enrichment in IQ is on biorxiv! 👏👏
Our the latest on biorxiv with
New results: Intelligence is genetically driven by genes enriched for specificity in cortical pyramidal neurons
@ewanbirney Yes - systems genetics I think are shown in our papers -
